text:
e="preserve"> (December 28, 1941 – August 10, 2020) was a Japanese actor. His career lasted from 1964 until his death. He was born in Awaji, Hyōgo. His best known roles were in "Tokyo Drifter", ' and "Katsu Kaishū". His brother, Tsunehiko Watase, who was also an actor.
Watari died of pneumonia on August 10, 2020 in Tokyo, aged 78.
